section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Changing the habits of consumers and industry in waste management. 
- New equipment for waste management 
- A new system in the store 
- A new service system
relevant_communication:
A list of manufacturing companies of the food and non-food consumer industries that generate waste. 
 
New established directives regulating environmental issues and obligations of legal and natural entities that generate waste packaging.
